root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 7-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: The indicator “Proportion of households with access to electricity” corresponds to the global SDG target 7.1.1: Proportion of population with access to electricity
Chỉ tiêu “Tỷ lệ hộ tiếp cận điện” tương ứng với chỉ tiêu SDG toàn cầu 7.1.1: Proportion of population with access to electricity
